verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses בְמִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness סִ֠ינַי <S%H5514><s%> of Sinai בַּשָּׁנָ֨ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַשֵּׁנִ֜ית <S%H8145><s%> of the second לְצֵאתָ֨ם <S%H3318><s%> after they were come out מֵאֶ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרַ֛יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <S%H7223><s%> in the first לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

וְיַעֲשׂ֧וּ <S%H6213><s%> also keep בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> Let the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפָּ֖סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover בְּמוֹעֲדֽוֹ׃ <S%H4150><s%> at his appointed season

בְּאַרְבָּעָ֣ה <S%H702><s%> four עָשָֽׂר־ <S%H6240><s%> teen י֠וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day בַּחֹ֨דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> of this month הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> of this בֵּ֧ין <S%H996><s%> at הָֽעֲרְבַּ֛יִם <S%H6153><s%> at even תַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> ye shall keep אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> בְּמוֹעֲד֑וֹ <S%H4150><s%> it in his appointed season כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all חֻקֹּתָ֥יו <S%H2708><s%> according to all the rites וּכְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all מִשְׁפָּטָ֖יו <S%H4941><s%> of it and according to all the ceremonies תַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> thereof shall ye keep אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַעֲשֹׂ֥ת <S%H6213><s%> that they should keep הַפָּֽסַח׃ <S%H6453><s%> the passover

וַיַּעֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> And they kept אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפֶּ֡סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover בָּרִאשׁ֡וֹן <S%H7223><s%> of the first בְּאַרְבָּעָה֩ <S%H702><s%> four עָשָׂ֨ר <S%H6240><s%> teen י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day לַחֹ֛דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> at הָעַרְבַּ֖יִם <S%H6153><s%> at even בְּמִדְבַּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness סִינָ֑י <S%H5514><s%> of Sinai כְּ֠כֹל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֤ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> according to all that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> so עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> so did בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> were certain אֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H582><s%> And there were certain men אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who הָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> become טְמֵאִים֙ <S%H2931><s%> who were defiled לְנֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> by the dead body אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> of a man וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָכְל֥וּ <S%H3201><s%> that they could לַעֲשֹׂת־ <S%H6213><s%> not keep הַפֶּ֖סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> on that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> they וַֽיִּקְרְב֞וּ <S%H7126><s%> and they came לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses וְלִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> and before אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> Aaron בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> on that day הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַ֠יֹּאמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> said הָאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H376><s%> men הָהֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> And those אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> about אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we טְמֵאִ֖ים <S%H2931><s%> unto him We [are] defiled לְנֶ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> by the dead body אָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> of a man לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> why נִגָּרַ֗ע <S%H1639><s%> wherefore are we kept back לְבִלְתִּ֨י <S%H1115><s%> because הַקְרִ֜ב <S%H7126><s%> that we may not offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קָרְבַּ֤ן <S%H7133><s%> an offering יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּמֹ֣עֲד֔וֹ <S%H4150><s%> in his appointed season בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Israel

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲלֵהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> about מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses עִמְד֣וּ <S%H5975><s%> unto them Stand still וְאֶשְׁמְעָ֔ה <S%H8085><s%> and I will hear מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> to what יְצַוֶּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> will command יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> what the LORD לָכֶֽם׃ פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> If any אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יִהְיֶֽה־ <S%H1961><s%> becomes טָמֵ֣א ׀ <S%H2931><s%> shall be unclean לָנֶ֡פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> by reason of a dead body אוֹ֩ <S%H176><s%> or בְדֶ֨רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> or [be] in a journey רְחֹקָ֜הׅ <S%H7350><s%> afar off לָכֶ֗ם א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> or לְדֹרֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1755><s%> of you or of your posterity וְעָ֥שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> yet he shall keep פֶ֖סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD

בַּחֹ֨דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשֵּׁנִ֜י <S%H8145><s%> of the second בְּאַרְבָּעָ֨ה <S%H702><s%> four עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> teen י֛וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> at הָעַרְבַּ֖יִם <S%H6153><s%> at even יַעֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> they shall keep אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with מַצּ֥וֹת <S%H4682><s%> it with unleavened bread וּמְרֹרִ֖ים <S%H4844><s%> and bitter יֹאכְלֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> it [and] eat

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> none יַשְׁאִ֤ירוּ <S%H7604><s%> They shall leave מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> of it עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> none of it unto the morning וְעֶ֖צֶם <S%H6106><s%> any bone לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יִשְׁבְּרוּ־ <S%H7665><s%> nor break ב֑וֹ כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all חֻקַּ֥ת <S%H2708><s%> of it according to all the ordinances הַפֶּ֖סַח <S%H6453><s%> of the passover יַעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> they shall keep אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וְהָאִישׁ֩ <S%H376><s%> But the man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who ה֨וּא <S%H1931><s%> he טָה֜וֹר <S%H2889><s%> that [is] clean וּבְדֶ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> and is not in a journey לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not הָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become וְחָדַל֙ <S%H2308><s%> and forbeareth לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to keep הַפֶּ֔סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> even the same soul הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he מֵֽעַמֶּ֑יהָ <S%H5971><s%> from among his people כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for קָרְבַּ֣ן <S%H7133><s%> not the offering יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> did not הִקְרִיב֙ <S%H7126><s%> because he brought בְּמֹ֣עֲד֔וֹ <S%H4150><s%> in his appointed season חֶטְא֥וֹ <S%H2399><s%> his sin יִשָּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> shall bear הָאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that man הַהֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וְכִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יָג֨וּר <S%H1481><s%> shall sojourn אִתְּכֶ֜ם <S%H854><s%> among גֵּ֗ר <S%H1616><s%> And if a stranger וְעָ֤שָֽׂה <S%H6213><s%> among you and will keep פֶ֙סַח֙ <S%H6453><s%> the passover לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כְּחֻקַּ֥ת <S%H2708><s%> according to the ordinance הַפֶּ֛סַח <S%H6453><s%> of the passover וּכְמִשְׁפָּט֖וֹ <S%H4941><s%> and according to the manner כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so יַעֲשֶׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> thereof so shall he do חֻקָּ֤ה <S%H2708><s%> ordinance אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> ye shall have one יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> shall have לָכֶ֔ם וְלַגֵּ֖ר <S%H1616><s%> both for the stranger וּלְאֶזְרַ֥ח <S%H249><s%> and for him that was born הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the land פ

וּבְיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> And on the day הָקִ֣ים <S%H6965><s%> was reared up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <S%H4908><s%> that the tabernacle כִּסָּ֤ה <S%H3680><s%> covered הֶֽעָנָן֙ <S%H6051><s%> the cloud אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁכָּ֔ן <S%H4908><s%> the tabernacle לְאֹ֖הֶל <S%H168><s%> [namely] the tent הָעֵדֻ֑ת <S%H5715><s%> of the testimony וּבָעֶ֜רֶב <S%H6153><s%> and at even יִהְיֶ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> become עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֛ן <S%H4908><s%> there was upon the tabernacle כְּמַרְאֵה־ <S%H4758><s%> as it were the appearance אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> until the morning

כֵּ֚ן <S%H3651><s%> So יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> it was תָמִ֔יד <S%H8548><s%> So it was alway הֶעָנָ֖ן <S%H6051><s%> the cloud יְכַסֶּ֑נּוּ <S%H3680><s%> covered וּמַרְאֵה־ <S%H4758><s%> it [by day] and the appearance אֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire לָֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> by night

וּלְפִ֞י <S%H6310><s%> And when הֵעָלֹ֤ת <S%H5927><s%> was taken up הֶֽעָנָן֙ <S%H6051><s%> the cloud מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> over הָאֹ֔הֶל <S%H168><s%> from the tabernacle וְאַ֣חֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> then after כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יִסְע֖וּ <S%H5265><s%> journeyed בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> that the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּבִמְק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> and in the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> after יִשְׁכָּן־ <S%H7931><s%> abode שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there הֶֽעָנָ֔ן <S%H6051><s%> where the cloud שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> there יַחֲנ֖וּ <S%H2583><s%> pitched their tents בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> there the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> At the commandment יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יִסְעוּ֙ <S%H5265><s%> journeyed בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> and at the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יַחֲנ֑וּ <S%H2583><s%> they pitched כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> long יְמֵ֗י <S%H3117><s%> as long as אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יִשְׁכֹּ֧ן <S%H7931><s%> abode הֶעָנָ֛ן <S%H6051><s%> the cloud עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> upon the tabernacle יַחֲנֽוּ׃ <S%H2583><s%> they rested

וּבְהַאֲרִ֧יךְ <S%H748><s%> tarried long הֶֽעָנָ֛ן <S%H6051><s%> And when the cloud עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <S%H4908><s%> upon the tabernacle יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> days רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> many וְשָׁמְר֧וּ <S%H8104><s%> kept בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> then the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <S%H4931><s%> the charge יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and not יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H5265><s%> and journeyed

וְיֵ֞שׁ <S%H3426><s%> And [so] it was אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after יִהְיֶ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> remained הֶֽעָנָ֛ן <S%H6051><s%> when the cloud יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> days מִסְפָּ֖ר <S%H4557><s%> was a few עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַמִּשְׁכָּ֑ן <S%H4908><s%> upon the tabernacle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according פִּ֤י <S%H6310><s%> according to the commandment יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יַחֲנ֔וּ <S%H2583><s%> they abode וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> in their tents and according to the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H5265><s%> they journeyed

וְיֵ֞שׁ <S%H3426><s%> And [so] it was אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יִהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> remained הֶֽעָנָן֙ <S%H6051><s%> when the cloud מֵעֶ֣רֶב <S%H6153><s%> abode from even עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> unto the morning וְנַעֲלָ֧ה <S%H5927><s%> was taken up הֶֽעָנָ֛ן <S%H6051><s%> and [that] the cloud בַּבֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning וְנָסָ֑עוּ <S%H5265><s%> then they journeyed א֚וֹ <S%H176><s%> or יוֹמָ֣ם <S%H3119><s%> whether [it was] by day וָלַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> or by night וְנַעֲלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> was taken up הֶעָנָ֖ן <S%H6051><s%> that the cloud וְנָסָֽעוּ׃ <S%H5265><s%> they journeyed

אֽוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> Whether יֹמַ֜יִם <S%H3117><s%> Or [whether it were] two days אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or חֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> or a month אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or יָמִ֗ים <S%H3117><s%> or a year בְּהַאֲרִ֨יךְ <S%H748><s%> tarried הֶעָנָ֤ן <S%H6051><s%> that the cloud עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַמִּשְׁכָּן֙ <S%H4908><s%> upon the tabernacle לִשְׁכֹּ֣ן <S%H7931><s%> remaining עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> above יַחֲנ֥וּ <S%H2583><s%> abode בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> thereon the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and did not יִסָּ֑עוּ <S%H5265><s%> in their tents and journeyed וּבְהֵעָלֹת֖וֹ <S%H5927><s%> not but when it was taken up יִסָּֽעוּ׃ <S%H5265><s%> they journeyed

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according פִּ֤י <S%H6310><s%> At the commandment יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יַחֲנ֔וּ <S%H2583><s%> they rested וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> in the tents and at the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD יִסָּ֑עוּ <S%H5265><s%> they journeyed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁמֶ֤רֶת <S%H4931><s%> the charge יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD שָׁמָ֔רוּ <S%H8104><s%> they kept עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> at the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> of Moses פ
